metadata.title: MW Infrastructure Stack — Canonical Document Repository
metadata.description: The MW Infrastructure Stack is a comprehensive 39-document constitutional framework for institutional-grade governance infrastructure. The stack provides deterministic, document-bound authority systems for evidence admissibility, compliance certification, dispute resolution, intellectual property permanence, and institutional reliance. All documents operate under Run-Only governance with SHA3-512 cryptographic verification. The system is designed for complete founder irrelevance — identical inputs produce identical outputs regardless of administration. This release contains all 39 canonical documents at v2.0.0 grade (MW Canon at v2.1.0), verified with SHA3-512 hashes and structured for institutional licensing under CC BY-ND 4.0.
metadata.notes: This is the canonical academic archive of the MW Infrastructure Stack. The primary repository is hosted on GitHub. This Zenodo archive ensures CERN-backed preservation independent of any single hosting platform. Institutional licensing inquiries should reference the IRUA Constitution (DOC-007) within this archive.
